definition: to make into/to change into/-ization/to ... -ize/to transform/abbr. for 化學|化学[hua4 xue2]

sentences.english: A new process for producing high - purity silica from silicofluoric acid is introduced .
sentences.chinese: 介紹一種用氟硅酸制高純二氧化硅的新工藝。

sentences.english: Other Ingredients: Kosher gelatin (capsule), cellulose, silicon dioxide and magnesium stearate.
sentences.chinese: 凝膠，纖維，二氧化硅和硬脂酸鎂。

sentences.english: Other Ingredients: Dicalcium Phosphate, Gelatin, Silica, Vegetable Magnesium Stearate.
sentences.chinese: 磷酸二鈣，凝膠，二氧化硅，植物硬脂酸鎂。

sentences.english: Other Ingredients: Gelatin, Dicalcium Phosphate, Silica, Vegetable Magnesium Stearate.
sentences.chinese: 凝膠，磷酸二鈣，二氧化硅，動物硬脂酸鎂。

sentences.english: The effect of the reaction conditions on the silver content of SiO2/Ag composites was also studied.
sentences.chinese: 通過控制反應條件，可以調控載銀二氧化硅的銀含量。

sentences.english: Two new gene transfection methods have been developed based on silica micro-particles.
sentences.chinese: 發展了兩種基於二氧化硅微顆粒的基因轉染新方法。

sentences.english: Dicalcium phosphate, cellulose, kosher gelatin (capsule), magnesium stearate and silicon dioxide.
sentences.chinese: 磷酸二鈣，纖維，凝膠，硬脂酸鎂和二氧化硅。

sentences.english: Other Ingredients: Gelatin, Silica, Vegetable Magnesium Stearate.
sentences.chinese: 凝膠，二氧化硅，植物硬脂酸鎂。

sentences.english: Kosher gelatin (capsule), rice flour, magnesium stearate and silicon dioxide.
sentences.chinese: 凝膠，米粉硬脂酸鎂和二氧化硅。

sentences.english: The method is to coat a wafer of silicon with a protective layer of silicon dioxide .
sentences.chinese: 其方法是往硅片上塗上一層二氧化硅防護膜。

sentences.english: Other Ingredients: Vegetable Cellulose, Gelatin, Silica, Vegetable Magnesium Stearate.
sentences.chinese: 植物纖維，凝膠，二氧化硅，植物硬脂酸鎂。

sentences.english: Superthin-SiO2 powder was prepared by the method of deposition.
sentences.chinese: 用沉澱法製備了超細二氧化硅粉體。

sentences.english: It's silicon dioxide, he equilibrium state would be a crystal.
sentences.chinese: 玻璃是二氧化硅，它的平衡狀態是晶體。

sentences.english: Other Ingredients: Kosher gelatin (capsule), dicalcium phosphate, magnesium stearate and silica.
sentences.chinese: 凝膠，磷酸二鈣，硬脂酸鎂和二氧化硅。

sentences.english: Silica sol is a kind of colloid solution well dispersing corpuscles of silicon dioxide in water.
sentences.chinese: 硅溶膠是二氧化硅的微粒分散於水中的膠體溶液。

sentences.english: Other Ingredients: Gelatin, Rice Powder, Silica, Vegetable Magnesium Stearate.
sentences.chinese: 凝膠，米粉，二氧化硅，植物硬脂酸鎂。
